DescriptionData.Title: Sample Scratch World Map Travel Edition Original 42 * 30cm
DescriptionData.Description:
Printed with fine paper with a gloss coating for luxury and works exactly like a scratch card, once the gold scratch is removed it reveals the mapping underneath.
Features: Not only are counies featured on the map, there are also cities shown on the top layer and the world map underneath, allowing for more detailed scratching. Great gift for avel lover. Printed with fine paper with a gloss coating for luxury and works exactly like a scratch card. Black and copper foil cover make it look more stylish on any wall.
Specifications: Type: big with cylinder packing, small with cylinder packing, small without cylinder packing, city version, luminous version, adventure version, black gold log, scratch globe (optional) Material: copper foil Item : 42 * 30cm / 16.5 * 11.8in Package : 32 * 5.5 * 5.5cm / 12.6 * 2.2 * 2.2in Package weight: 90g / 3.2oz
Package list: 1 * Map
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 100% Brand New and High Quality Premium
